definitions.definition: Ellipsis of ergative case ( “ a grammatical case used to indicate the agent of a transitive verb in ergative-absolutive languages ” ) .
An ergative verb or other expression .

main_definition: ( grammar ) Ellipsis of ergative case ( “ a grammatical case used to indicate the agent of a transitive verb in ergative-absolutive languages ” ) .
secondary_definitions: ( grammar ) An ergative verb or other expression .
